channel.title: Firebay Electro Plumbing
channel.description: Recent content on Firebay Electro Plumbing

item.title: Long time no blogging...
item.description: Welcome to Firebay Electro Plumbing -blog. It has been around 11 years since my last blogging attempt and while I find Facebook to be nice platform for ad hoc -stories, I find the short lifetime of stories in feed and the search functionality quite lacking. Hence I decided to put up a blog platform to document my hobby electronics projects, retro computer refurbishing stories and just general stuff I find interesting.
